ygData.subject: EQ Connection???
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, Do any of you have problems when you connect to the patch server for updates? It just tells me checking for updates...and then some error about my
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Guys,

Do any of you have problems when you connect to the patch server for
updates?
It just tells me checking for updates...and then some error about my
connection comes up..telling me to
check my connection.


The problem is I have NO problem with my connection....everything else works
well...Diablo2...IE...Netscape...other games!

BAH...if anyone knows any potential source of this problem or a possible
solution...pls let me know..Thanks!


Regards,
Zanderion aka Anson
